eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Missouri; AT 03:51 PM ON SEP 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:51 PM SEP 30, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THE SUNSET HILLS POLICE DEPARTMENT HAS ISSUED AN AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION THAT OCCURRED AT SUNSET HILLS , MISSOURI ON 09/28/2025 AT 04:46 PM.  

ABDUCTED WAS XAILYN SCHOLL, WHITE, FE, AGE 2. 

SUSPECT VEHICLE IS A DARK BLUE 2016 CHEVROLET CRUZE SEDAN - 4 DOOR BEARING MISSOURI REGISTRATION 'G' 'L' '1','C' '0' 'H'.  
VEHICLE/SUSPECT LAST SEEN EASTBOUND ON MISSOURI 30 FROM INTERSTATE 270. 

SUSPECT IS JACOB ROBERT PUTMAN A WHITE, MALE, 30, 5 FEET 10 INCHES TALL, 160 POUNDS AND HAS BLUE EYES. 
LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. 
SUSPECT HAS MULITPLE FACIAL AND NECK TATTOOS. 

VICTIM XAILYN SCHOLL. 
LAST SEEN WEARING NO CLOTHING DESCRIPTION. 

SUSPECT APPROACHED THE MOTHER OF THE VICTIM ASKING FOR ASSISTANCE WITH JUMPSTARTING HIS VEHICLE, THEN TOOK THE MOTHER'S VEHICLE WITH CHILD STILL IN THE BACK SEAT. ALERT ISSUED FOR TROOP C AREA.. 

PLEASE CALL 9 1 1 OR SUNSET HILLS POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 314-849-4400 IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO THIS ALERT.
